source.6a40af22:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sbn
veri = pd.read_csv("../input/entrepreneurial-competency-in-university-students/data.csv")
source.910f518d:
x = veri[["DesireToTakeInitiative","Competitiveness","SelfReliance","StrongNeedToAchieve","SelfConfidence","IndividualProject","Gender","KeyTraits","Influenced"]]
y = veri["y"]
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split,cross_val_score as cvs
x_train,x_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(x,y,test_size=0.2,random_state=42)
source.d05e599e:
import statsmodels.api as sm
loj = sm.Logit(y_train,x_train).fit()
loj.summary()
source.97d80faa:
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression as lr
loj = lr(solver = "saga",penalty="l1")
loj_model = loj.fit(x_train,y_train)
cvs(loj_model,x_test,y_test,cv=10).mean()
source.b4a4cf7a:
from sklearn.naive_bayes import GaussianNB as GNB
nb = GNB()
nb_model = nb.fit(x_train,y_train)
proba = nb_model.predict_proba(x_test)
y_pred = nb_model.predict(x_test)

cvs(nb_model,x_test,y_test,cv=10).mean()
source.39b8bda2:
from sklearn.svm import SVC
svm_model = SVC(kernel="rbf").fit(x_train,y_train)
y_pred = svm_model.predict(x_test)
cvs(svm_model,x_test,y_test,cv=10).mean()
source.52e3c627:
from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier
knn = KNeighborsClassifier()
knn_model = knn.fit(x_train,y_train)
y_pred = knn_model.predict(x_test)
cvs(knn_model,x_test,y_test,cv=10).mean()
source.c59b166d:
import nltk
nltk.download("stopwords")
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
sw = stopwords.words("english")
veri["ReasonsForLack"] = veri["ReasonsForLack"].apply(lambda x: " ".join(x for x in x.split() if x not in sw))
